      • parseBigInteger

        public static java.math.BigInteger parseBigInteger(byte[] input)
        Reads bytes from a provided byte array, interprets them as a packed decimal and converts it to a number.
        Parameters:
        input - byte array containing a packed decimal
        Returns:
        value of the packed decimal
        See Also:
        http://www.simotime.com/datapk01.htm

      • format

        public static byte[] format(long value)

      • format

        public static int format(long value,
         byte[] output)
        Convert long value into packed decimal representation
        Parameters:
        value - value to convert into packed decimal representation
        output - array into which the result will be saved (bytes)
        Returns:
        number of bytes in output containing value (length of the result)

      • putPackedDecimal

        public static int putPackedDecimal(CloverBuffer dataBuffer,
                   java.math.BigInteger value,
                   int minLength)
        Puts the value into the CloverBuffer as a packed decimal. Set minLength to 0 to disable padding.
        Parameters:
        dataBuffer -
        value -
        minLength - minimum length (used for padding)
        Returns:
        number of produced bytes
        See Also:
        http://www.simotime.com/datapk01.htm
